fields.creator: British Library EAP853
subject: Legal records
Brazil
fields.format: 1 manuscript proceeding with 38 folios, plus the cover.
fields.description: Inventory of goods of Clara Maria de Jesus, 1782, with Carlos Bizerra do Valle (brother in law) as the executor. It contains the civil libel of her divorce with Domingos Gonçalves Nunes and a Will (copy) taken place at the Santo Andre Farm. Description of the goods: a blue camlet skirt and slaves. There is a term that  Jose Alvares Bezerra should produce an accountability report  as the executor of the goods of his father Carlos Bizerra do Valle and as the tutor of the orphan Vicente, son of Maria Clara de Jesus. Accontability report of Carlos Bizerra do Valle.  Contains rips, water marks,  faded ink, suffering from iron gall ink corrosion.
fields.title: Inventário de Clara Maria de Jesus – 1782
fields.institution: Arquivo do Fórum Nivaldo de Farias Brito

Description of the goods: silver spoons, a box, a wooden table, a main residence at the  Badallo farm, a small plot of land at the Rio do Peixe, cows, and other goods. It includes terms of bail in which Domingos Antunes de Abreu (son) was the guarantor.  Contains rips, water marks, faded ink, damaged from biological agents (such as mold, bacterias, insects, bugs or rodents)and from iron gall ink, parts of the document are missing

Description of goods: gold (rosary, padlocks, rings, buttons), silver (knives, forks, spoons); a table, a bed, branding iron, an axe; cattle and horses, sheep; slaves (Angola, criole, "cabra"); main house and corrals in Bonfim; a house in São João; some land (in Ligeiro da Timbauba, São José farm), land and houses in Vila de Pato. Document with the initial pages damaged, with tears, fold marks, water stains. Attention: there are three inventory together. From the image IMG_6938 to the image IMG_7226 comprises the inventory of  Domingos Jose de Sousa; from IMG_ 7227 to IMG_7336 belong the the inventory of  Florinda Rosa de Jesus; from IMG_7338 to IMG_7380 belongs to the inventory of Ignacia Merandalinda de Sousa.
fields.title: Inventário de Florinda Rosa de Jesus / inventariante Domingos Jose de Souza e Domingos Jose de Souza / inventariante Ignacia Merendolina de Souza – 1857 a 1875
fields.institution: Arquivo do Fórum Nivaldo de Farias Brito

Brazil

fields.description: Handwritten document.  A notice of the inventory of goods that the Municipal Judge and of Orphans, Francisco Felix Villar de Carvalho, requested after the death of the Captain Domingos Maria Correia de Queiroz, married to Ana Maria de Queiroz, the executor in 16 December 1889, and written by the clerk Francisco Cordeiro da Cunha. He had five children and heirs. The curator was José Joaquim Correia de Queiroz. Description of goods:  silver title and of iron, house furniture, animals (cows, horses, goats and sheep), brick houses and also wattle and daub houses, plots for cultivation, fenced pasture and parts of land in small farms, passive debts. There is a notice of the division of goods, in 14 May 1890. The document has yellowed, with brittle edges, with inadequate intervention (masking tape), it has water stains, and the ink has faded.
fields.title: Inventário do Capitão Domingos Maria Correia de Queirós \ inventariante Ana Maria de Queiros – 1889
fields.institution: Arquivo do Fórum Nivaldo de Farias Brito

The heirs are the children and grandchildren.There is term of forgivennes of the goods not in the inventory so that the heirs can do division of goods. Descripton of the inventory of goods: a wattle and daub house and two plots for cultivation. There is a term of division of goods, in 18 October 1889. The document has yellowed, it is brittled around the edges with tiny holes, and suffers from the action of iron gall ink.
fields.title: Inventário de Felis Ferreira da Silva e Maria Thereza de Jesus \ inventariante Manoel Gonçalves Pereira – 1889
